name: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte
desc: An object that wraps a matting image for a particular semantic segmentation.

items.name: init(fromImageSourceAuxiliaryDataType: CFString, dictionaryRepresentation: [AnyHashable : Any])
items.desc: Returns a new semantic segmentation matte instance from auxiliary image information in an image file.

items.name: func replacingSemanticSegmentationMatte(with: CVPixelBuffer) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a semantic segmentation matte instance that wraps the replacement pixel buffer.

items.name: func applyingExifOrientation(CGImagePropertyOrientation) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new semantic segmentation matte instance with the specified Exif orientation applied.

items.name: func dictionaryRepresentation(forAuxiliaryDataType: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSString?>?) -> [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: Returns a dictionary of primitive map information to use when writing an image file with a semantic segmentation matte.

items.name: var matteType: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType
items.desc: The semantic segmentation matte image type.

items.name: struct AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType
items.desc: A structure that defines the types of segmentation matte images that you can capture along with the primary image.

items.name: var mattingImage: CVPixelBuffer
items.desc: The semantic segmentation matte’s internal image.

items.name: var pixelFormatType: OSType
items.desc: The pixel format type for this object’s internal matting image.
